assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures were performed in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation and with the 1964 Helsinki Declaration, as revised in 2013, as well as the Japanese ethical guidelines for human genome/gene analysis research. This study was approved by the Institutional Review Boards of Saitama Cancer Center (No. 476 and 729). Written consent was obtained from the patient before inclusion in the study.
